page.title: 14LEISURE
page.content: {SPORT}There are many sports facilites in Speke. In the{Swimming baths}they do more than just swim, they have judo, self-defence classes, ju jitsu, karate, and boxing are just a few. In the{Community centre}they have a five a side football team. They play other Community centres. The Police also have a five a side football team. The{Boysey}which is a sports centre has Boxing, snooker, table tennis and football. In the parade they are now building a new{Sports Centre}attached to the Swimming Baths. Inside there will be a gymnasiun, sauna, and many other sports facilities. {FOOTBALL:}The under 11 league (Sunday league). The Anderson and Woodgrove (Under 11 and 10). Halewood Juniors and The Dove and Olive, and well as teams for adults.
